prompt_base: photograph of a short, highly muscular martial arts monk, completely bald head, six distinct incense burn scars on forehead, determined expression, orange martial arts gi
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, high detailed skin, cinematic lighting, dslr, soft bokeh, subtle light reflection on the burn scars, defined muscles, realistic fabric texture on gi
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, large nose, six dots missing, perfect skin, smooth head, helmet hair, flat lighting
